data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update Causes Significant Search Volatility
data.Description: The Google August 2024 core update, which finished rolling out earlier than expected, continues to cause significant search ranking volatility.  Experts are unsure if the volatility is a result of the update or other factors. Google's Search Liaison, Danny Sullivan, recently stated that publishers may not recover previous traffic levels after algorithm updates.

data.Title: Microsoft Partners with StopNCII to Remove Non-Consensual Intimate Images from Bing
data.Description: Microsoft has partnered with StopNCII to remove non-consensual intimate images, including deepfakes, from its Bing search engine. This initiative aims to protect victims of revenge porn and combat the spread of harmful content online.

data.Title: Hackers Target SEO Campaigns to Spread Malware
data.Description: Hackers are exploiting SEO campaigns to spread new and potentially dangerous malware. This tactic poses a significant threat to online safety and digital marketing efforts.

data.Title: Google's Ad Tech Practices Face Scrutiny in UK Antitrust Case
data.Description: The UK's Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) is objecting to Google's ad tech practices, alleging that the company is leveraging its dominance in online display advertising to favor its own services and stifle competition.

data.Title: Google Search Console Reporting Anomaly for URLs Blocked by robots.txt
data.Description: Google Search Console is reporting URLs as blocked by robots.txt even when they are not, specifically when a URL passes through a redirect that is blocked. This reporting anomaly has caused confusion among website owners and SEO professionals.

data.Title: Google Emphasizes the Importance of Contextual Links in Core Updates
data.Description: Kostav Hristov, CEO of QGP Limited, highlighted the significance of contextual links in the wake of Google's August Core Update. He emphasized that Google's algorithms prioritize content with relevant and authoritative backlinks, underscoring the need for a holistic SEO strategy.

data.Title: Google Downplays Significance of Spam Scores for Website Owners
data.Description: Google's John Mueller advised website owners not to obsess over spam scores, deeming them insignificant in the grand scheme of things. He urged creators to prioritize the creation of high-quality, impactful content over worrying about these metrics.
